participant_1.background:
I enjoy watching the rain from the window and cuddling with my cats.
I always make time for a good anime before work, and I always pack a banana for my morning run.
i ride a motorcycle , but it s not a harley.
I've never been in a relationship, but I'm open to it if I find someone who shares my passion for dancing.
I don't have a favorite book, but I enjoy reading about the history of the west coast.

participant_2.background:
I love pizza, especially when I'm with my friends.
I would brag about my climbing skills and all the amazing places I've been able to go because of them.
my favorite meal is chicken and rice.
I value my car because it allows me to be independent and travel wherever I want.
i have 3 ex wives.

content.text: Hi! I'm a big fan of anime too. What are some of your favorite shows?
Hi! Me too! I love One Piece, Attack on Titan, and Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood.
Nice, I've seen all of those! Have you heard of Hunter x Hunter?
Yes, I've heard of it but I haven't checked it out yet. Is it good?
I really enjoyed it! It's a bit long, but it's a really good story.
I'll have to check it out!
You should! What kind of motorcycle do you have?
I have a Honda Rebel 500. It's a great starter bike.
I've heard good things about that bike! I'm thinking about getting one myself.
You should! It's a lot of fun to ride.
I'm sure it is. I've always wanted to get a motorcycle.
I'll have to look into it more.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
It's definitely something you should try at least once.
I will! I'm sure I'll enjoy it.
